subject: Tracking number inquiry
description_text:
Dear Sir/Madam,

My Order number is #SSN3933 under the name of Ultan Karpavicius to postcode
P31 E308. I ordered my pedals without an account and so I didn't
receive any email with the tracking number. I'm wondering if I could be
provided one through this email?

Best regards,
-Ultan

conversations.body_text: Hi Florid,     Your order has been shipped via SF Express International, and the last-mile delivery is usually handled by UPS. The screenshot below shows the latest tracking information for your reference.
